description: From the hit show Mai-Hime and master sculptor Sakurasaka Mikoto comes the elegant and intelligent Natsuki Kuga in a bold yet dignified stance befitting both her outward strength and inner kindness. This top-quality figure also goes well with her co-star Mai, scheduled for later release.
name: Natsuki Kuga (くがなつき)

subtitle: The legendary group of six is back!
description: First sold in August of 2005, GSC's first trading figure set made quite a splash with its superb quality and helped to establish GSC's now stellar reputation. Now that legendary trading figure set is being reissued for general sale! Six characters, Saber, Rin Tohsaka, Archer, Rider, Ilya, and Sakura Matou, make up the all-star lineup, and are on sale now!
name: Fate/stay night Trading Figures (ふぇいとすていないつ とれーでぃんぐふぃぎゅあ)
sculptor: Saber&Archer = Mirano Rider = YOSHI Ilya = Kawahara Takayuki (ALTER) Sakura = Tokunaga Hironori (ALTER) Rin + Secret = Hiroshi Inagaki (ALTER)

subtitle: Even the captain is in a swimsuit?!
description: Following the release of Kaname Chidori from the popular anime "Full Metal Panic? Fumoffu", comes a PVC figure of Teletha Testarossa. Teletha Testarossa (aka Tessa) has arrived in an unruly school swimsuit!
name: Teletha Testarossa Swimsuit Ver. (てれさてっさろっさ みずぎばーじょん)
copyright: © 賀東招二・四季童子／陣代高校生徒会

subtitle: Bright eyed and bushy-tailed! A highschool girl with a rocket launcher?!
description: A swimsuit and a rocket launcher in the same figure - a view you will only ever see modeled by the beautiful Kaname Chidori, the normally reliable high school student, who has now been sculpted into this figure in her swimsuit. She is giving a wonderfully refreshing smile and her body's beautiful curves are easily noticeable through her swimsuit. The items she holds emphasize her lively nature. Enjoy the fresh ideas behind the figure!
name: Kaname Chidori (ちどりかなめ)
copyright: © 賀東招二・四季童子／陣代高校生徒会

subtitle: One-hit kill!  Excelion Buster A.C.S!
description: From Lyrical Nanoha A's, Nanoha Takamachi follows the earlier Fate Testarossa figure onto the scene, prototyped once again by master sculptor Kazushi Kawasaki. Clad in her Sacred Mode Barrier Jacket, Nanoha cuts a gallant figure as she prepares to take on her next opponent, exhibiting both her strength and graceful motion. If Fate was defined by her calm demeanour, Nanoha is certainly defined by her energy and constant motion. Display both heroines together for the full anime effect!
name: Nanoha Takamachi (たかまちなのは)
copyright: © なのは A's PROJECT All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A single figure with 2 completely different types of equipment!! Part of the 35MAX series!!
description: Max Factory's VOTOMS action figure series is proud to announce the "35MAX SERIES06: Standing Turtle". The highlight of this figure is its ability to change from the "Standing Turtle" to the "Standing Tortoise MK II" simply by exchanging the various parts that come included with the figure! You can also exchange parts with any other figures in the series. It's one figure with 2 completely different types of equipment! The Swampy Crag legs have ball joints to allow many different poses to be taken, and the flamethrower is included. The Tortoise MK II's shoulder missile pods can be rotated and moved.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 06 : Standing Turtle (Standing Tortoise MK II) (すたんでぃんぐたーとる)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Kazuo Kawahata)

subtitle: Are They Really Cursed Cat Panties?!
description: She's a tsundere magical girl, and a maid as well! She has all the elements to make any guy in this world exited! From the popular series "Majikano" comes Ayumi Mamiya - sculpted in her maid uniform that she is forced to use in the main character's house. In order to educate the useless Haruo into being a true man, she continues to serve him. We won't show you unless you purchase the figure, but are those cat panties under her skirt? It's really worth a look!! We hope you enjoy it...
name: Ayumi Mamiya (まみやあゆみ)
copyright: © 2005　百瀬武昭・講談社／マジカノ製作委員会

subtitle: Ypsilon's Machine! The prototype AT designed for the perfect soldier is here!
description: Max Factory's VOTOMS action figure series is proud to announce the "35MAX SERIES05" "Strikedog". Designed by the Secret Society, the Blood Sucker was a new experimental H-class AT. It was the first machine to be developed specifically for perfect soldiers from its basic design stages. This machine appeared in VOTOMS from the end of the Kummen storyline to the Sunsa storyline as a machine that only Ypsilon used. It's covered in blue paint, with a huge iron claw, and the thruster backpack that made interstellar combat possible. The above mentioned iron claw is moveable, and it's also possible to replace both the left and right arms with common arm parts. It’s equipped with the large solid shooter and a thruster, which make it makes a truly fascinating AT.
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 05 Strikedog (すとらいくどっく)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Shinji Koshinuma)

subtitle: The one who calls herself the Protector of Mankind...
description: From the popular PC game "Jingai Makyou" comes Ignis, the self proclaimed "Protector of Mankind", as a PVC figure brought to you by Orchid Seed. Ignis has already been released by other figure making companies, but this sculpt has a unique, soft image, which makes effective use of space by using a lengthwise standing position, and gives an overall impression of the highest quality. As an interesting addition, you can replace the parts around the breast area. The sculpting done by Satoshi Ishiyama truly is something to see - he's already featured in specialized magazines, and looking at his work you'll know why. Now that Good Smile Company has put this figure on the production line, we hope you enjoy it!
name: Ignis (いぐにす)

subtitle: Everything is for her master...  she is a maid that will continue to fight.
description: From the popular 2D fighting game "Samurai Shodown VI", comes the popular fighting maid character "Iroha", who has been sculpted as part of Art Storm's LILICS series. She uses her skills from the Hourin Ousai fighting school to repay the kindness of her master, and her fighting form was captured in a limited edition garage kit created by popular sculpting group Cerberus Project. Now that kit has finally been released as a PVC figure. Her true form is that of the crane, and this charming pose allows you to see that side of her too.
* This item has a limited number of goods available for distribution from Good Smile Company.
name: Iroha (いろは)
copyright:
© SNK PLAYMORE
※『サムライスピリッツ』は株式会社SNKプレイモアの登録商標です。

subtitle: Kotona in her swimsuit!
description: From the 2005 anime that broadcast on TV Tokyo "Zoid's Genesis", comes one of the two heroines: Kotona Elegance! Sculptor Chieri has taken a famous illustration that featured in Megami Magazine, and turned it into a figure! During the 2006 Winter WonFes, it was sold as a garage kit only, but now you can get the PVC masterpiece that featured on the front cover of Figure Maniax Vol.20! She is holding a clear blue tube, which generates a very refreshing scene, and her sensuous bodyline has been miraculously sculpted. We bring the attractive Kotona to you!
name: Kotona Elegance (ことな・えれがんす)

subtitle: The anime has finally begun to air! A re-release of this figure to celebrate!
description: The anime version of the popular "Kodomo no Jikan" has just started to air. By popular demand the figure of the main heroine, Rin Kokonoe has once again been re-released! The popular position from the front cover of the original manga has been taken by sculptor Chieri and made into a very expressive figure. Looking at the situation of Rin picking up her text book, somehow seems to make your heart beat. Would you become a teacher if you had a girl that matured this fast in your class?
name: Rin Kokonoe (ここのえりん)
copyright: © 私屋カヲル/こどものじかん製作委員会

subtitle: The 2nd figure from the "Shining Project"! The Ice Witch!
description: Part of the combined project from Sega, Max Factory and Hobby Japan, the "Shining Project". Based on the popular game "Shining Tears" comes the second in the project "Blanc Neige", the cool and charming character - and also the most popular of them all! Just like the previously introduced Elwyn, she was also drawn my popular illustrator Tony. His illustration was taken by Hiiru Saitou and faithfully sculpted into a figure. She's holding up her breasts, and her hair is made from clear plastic with a pearl coating, giving it a transparent and high class feeling. Lots of attention was paid to the low-cut pants line. It's a figure loaded with promise, of a cool girl in a bold swimsuit. We hope you like it.
name: Blanc Neige (ぶらんねーじゅ)

subtitle: Eukanaria, The selfish demon with an F cup is here!
description: Since 2002, Izumi Kawachi has had his manga "Enchanter" serialized in Monthly Gangan Wing. From this series comes the bewitching Eukanariam, finely sculpted with a powerful presence! With an F-cup bust, a slender waist, and well-rounded hips, she's always fascinating those around her. That of course includes the main character of the series, who is always temped by her lure. Her spell books have fallen out of her bag, and are scattering all over... even the smallest of details has had lots of attention paid to them, so be sure to check out this masterpiece!
name: Eukanaria (ゆうかなりあ)

subtitle: The third Nendoroid, Mesousa, is here!
description: Created by the mysterious sculptor Nendoron, the Nendoroid series sees its third entry in Mesousa, the chronically depressed, constantly weeping rabbit from the anime Pani Poni Dash! Though he is only a supporting character, his unusual demeanour and bevy of injuries make quite an impact during the show. Equipped with a rich variety of alternate parts and accompanied by his friends the Cat God and Giant Salamander, this set is fun to play with or display anywhere from your desk to your dinner table.
name: Nendoroid Mesousa (めそうさ ねんどろいど)
copyright: © 氷川へきる／スクウェアエニックス・ぱにぽに製作委員会

subtitle: Now you can have your very own silver Death Note!
description: From the much-discussed TV anime Death Note comes this sterling silver pendant rendition of the main character's infamous Death Note, which he used to throw the world into chaos. The book lies open to the memorable "how to use it" instructional page, engraved in great detail befitting high-quality accessory. Look forward to more Good Smile Company accessories coming soon!
name: Death Note Pendant (ですのーとぺんだんと)
copyright: © 大場つぐみ・小畑健／集英社・ＶＡＰ・マッドハウス・ＮＴＶ・Ｄ．Ｎ．ドリームパートナーズ

subtitle: Watch as her Bardiche Assault slices through the air!
description: Fate Testarossa, one of the heroines of Lyrical Nanoha A's, wields her sword, the Bardiche Assault, in this exciting battle scene. Her hair and cloak fly out behind her, tiny frame carried along with the huge sword's lightning edge. Though her pose is daring and brash, her face is calm, demonstrating her incredible inner strength and force of will. This figure also matches the upcoming Nanoha Takamachi, and includes a display pedestal etched with her magic circle.
name: Fate Testarossa (ふぇいと・てっさろっさ)
copyright: © なのは A's PROJECT All Rights Reserved.

subtitle: A shopping bag in her hand, Sakura's on her way home!
description: Sakura Matou, the fourth in our Fate/hollow ataraxia series, is here! A contented smile plays across her face as she walks over to Shirou's house to make some tasty dinner, with love as its secret ingredient. Her hair and school uniform skirt move slightly in the wind, combining with her well-proportioned bust to create a carefree atmosphere. Also note the realistic plastic bag, a product of exhaustive study of the real thing. We hope you enjoy this wonderful rendition of a beautiful girl.
name: Sakura Matou Shopping ver. (まとうさくら ゆうしょくばーじょん)

subtitle: The beautiful, essential Mizuho Kazami is finally here from GSC!
description: From her pulled back hair and overflowing bust to the soft sensuous thighs barely contained by her bikini, Ms. Mizuho's charm cannot be denied. Everything about this sculpt, down to her position in the clear-cast chair and the way her hand holds the detailed parfait cup, evokes a playful summer scene while still exuding a fascinating mature sensibility. It would be no exaggeration to say that Mizuho is among the best subjects for a stunningly sexy figure such as this, and Good Smile brings nothing but the best quality to her already gorgeous visage.
name: Mizuho Kazami (かざみみずほ)

subtitle: The legendary 17th episode...  without any restraints!
description: Following the previously released 1/8 scale figures, comes the forth release in Max Factory's "Gun X Sword" series, this time as trading figures! This time, the figures were all based on episode 17, which as fans know, was a very controversial episode. All the girls are gathered together in swimsuits, posed in no-holds-barred poses! The "donkey censor" that caused an uproar is also included. They’re a bit different to the rest, but look forward to Max Factory's Gun X Sword trading figures!
name: COLLECT600 Gun X Sword #17 (がんそーど)
sculptor: Max Factory (Yuuji Kudou - Masanori Kuroda - Tetsuya Yamada - Shinji Koshinuma)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: The 1st figure from the "Shining Project"! The daughter of the Forest God!
description: Part of the combined project from Sega, Max Factory and Hobby Japan, the "Shining Project". The first release! From the popular game "Shining Tears" comes Elwyn, one of the heroines of the story. Originally drawn by the popular illustrator Tony, the figure has been sculpted faithfully to the original. She's got her characteristic elf ears, as well as her natural leaf bikini, and a pareo around her waist which can be removed. The detailed sculpting of the feathers on her head is a must-see! Look out for the future releases in the "Shining Project"!
name: Elwyn (えるうぃん)

subtitle: The second in the GSC trading figure series!
description: This beautiful continues in the tradition of the original SMILE500 Fate series of trading figures with the same excellent sculpting and elegant coloration that garnered accolades from collectors everywhere, and also innovates with posable figures and replacement parts! With both the popular men and women from the popular series on display, this memorable set of trading figures is sure to please.
name: SMILE 600 Fate/stay night ~collective memories~ (すまいる600 ふぇいとすていないつ)

subtitle: How about a nice date with her on a quiet day off?
description: This is the second of the Good Smile Company 1/6th scale Fate figures, but of course Saber comes first in popularity! Slightly embarrassed in her casual attire, she still looks directly at you, and the attention to detail in her pose and dress gives the impression that she really is in the middle of a date on her day off. Saber as a normal girl is no doubt an enticing prospect, no matter how abnormal she may be.
name: Saber Vacation Ver. (せいばー きゅうじつばーじょん)

subtitle: This mysterious beauty appears on the night of the fourth day.
description: Though she appears in very few scenes in the game, Caren Ortenzia could be considered the main heroine based on the important role she plays in the plot development. She stands tall, hair blowing in the wind and face calm, golden eyes seemingly focused on the viewer in this rendition, which truly captures the mysterious air surrounding the character. She is the third 1/6th scale Fate/hollow ataraxia figure from GSC, and truly a fine addition to any collection.
name: Caren Ortenzia Prologue ver. (かれん・おるてんしあ)

subtitle: The Eyes of Death...  And the knife that carries out their vision
description: Type Moon's Ryuugi Shiki just oozes cool in her very first figure! Dressed in her signature kimono and leather jacket ensemble, she fights the strange things which have invaded this world. Her deadly eyes fixed, she raises her knife as it glints in the moonlight in this dynamically posed statue. This statue truly captures Shiki's impressive appearance, and is now ready for delivery.
name: Shiki Ryougi (りょうぎしき)

subtitle: The bright and cheerful witch with 3rd class magic!
description: A slapstick comedy anime "Renkin 3-kyuu Magical? Pokaan", which follows the story of 4 princesses from the netherland started in April 2006, and from that series comes a figure of “Yuuma”, the witch. She has been sculpted flying on her magical rod into the night sky! She's on a stand shaped as a crescent moon, with her pet the onigiri bunny with her. Would you like to go for a fly into the night skies with a young witch that forgot to put on panties?
name: Yuuma (ゆうま)
copyright: © 2005　がらくたはうす／まじぽか團

subtitle: "The Noblest Sword" has arrived as an overwhelming figure!
description: From Nitroplus's popular PC game "Jingai Makyou" comes a figure of the main heroine Ignis! Reviving the illustration from illustrator NiΘ (of Demonbane fame), took the sculptor over 4 months to perfect! Her hair and clothes have been elegantly sculpted, and her hips, neck and hair are all incredibly detailed. Her clothes have the original butterfly pattern on them, as well as the see-through back material. Also includes glasses that can be worn, and a mirror base. It's a masterpiece with so many highlights that it's enough to make you wonder if it's real.
name: Ignis (いぐにす)

subtitle: The AT-G project, the new grand collaboration, has begun!  Lucy here is the first V.I.P figure!
description: The V.I.P (Venus Idol Project) series features beautiful girls based on drawings by popular illustrators of the AT-G artist collective on collectible trading cards. This first figure in the series is based on art by Kawata Hisashi, which differs slightly from the official design. Lucy Maria Misora is seen here with a very proper, almost disapproving expression befitting her character, which belies the beauty of her slender legs, which she takes pains to hide. This original take on a popular character is sure to make any fan water at the mouth. Don't miss your chance to have this demure beauty for your very own! We're working to expand the AT-G limited edition figure set, so be sure to check out the official AT-G website.
name: Lucy Maria Misora

subtitle: The wandering lone wolf. Van of the Dawn!
description: Following Max Factory's "Wendy" and "Carmen 99" figures from Gun X Sword, comes the third in the series, Van! He is a finely detailed figure, with parts that expresses both the strong and sorrowful parts of the character, as well as his sharp gaze. Sculptor Katou Taichi put his soul into this work - he's recreated the figure of Van rampaging on Endless Illusion, the planet of rouges.
*SOG stands for "Spirit of Guys" - a series of figures based off male characters. Van is the first in this series.
name: Van (う゛ぁん)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: Worldly desires begone!
description: Introducing the heroine Chitose Nanbu, from the popular anime series "Amaenaideyo!!". Her three sizes are 95/58/85... a girl with such a perfect score has been sculpted in a 1/6 scale! The same prototype sculptor who sculpted Ignis, Masato Kitade also sculpted this figure. The body line you can see underneath her robes, and her beautiful legs truly bring out her adult appeal. The string of beads can be removed, so you can display her how you prefer. She is displayed on an artistic stand depicting a wooden floor; which really draws out the atmosphere of the figure. This work of art... its beauty cannot be displayed in pictures!
name: Chitose Nanbu (なんぶちとせ)
copyright: © 2005ボヘミアンK・宗我部としのり/ワニブックス・AT-X・VAP

subtitle: No kisses allowed. But stay right there.
description: Last year in summer, the anime "My Wife is a Magical Girl" aired, and quickly gained popularity. Max Factory now proudly announces a figure from that series - the heroine, Ureshiko Asaba! The warm, charming character is sculpted with a listless expression under her parasol. Her fine complexion is shown in her thighs, and her beautiful legs are not to be missed! "If I kiss you, you'll lose your magic power?" The wife you’re not allowed to kiss is a magical girl in pain, enjoy the figure!
name: Uresiko Asaba (あさばうれしこ)
series: My Wife is a Magical Girl
copyright: © 2005 J.C.STAFF・錦織博・池口和彦/奥さまは魔法少女製作委員会

subtitle: The first, limited edition figure in the 35MAX EX Series!!
description: Announcing the Brustish Dog from the VOTOMS 35MAX series, brought to you by Max Factory! Fans of VOTOMS will already know, but this is the Secret Society's remodeled Scopedog - a mid-class AT designed for perfect soldiers. The MC Pack system went through a large tune-up in order to increase the mobility of the machine to be above all other machines in the Scopedog series. The entire body is coordinated in red, and the right arm is equipped with heavy weapons, including the 7 barrel Gatling gun and an iron claw. In the anime, the main character Chirico has a struggle to the death in this AT, so it should have a deep meaning to fans of the series. Only 3000 copies of this figure are going to be made, so don't let your chance to get this premium item fall away!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES Limited Edition EX-01 Brutishdog (ぶるーてぃっしゅどっく)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department (Takeshi Hamasaki - Takashi Morimoto)

subtitle: She's back on her lion, just as cute as ever!
description: Ah, the Nendoroids... They're not just adorable, but fun to play with too! Lazy Saber, largely responsible for building the series' reputation among the foremost super-deformed figures, is back for another run! Though the series continues to press on, Lazy Saber's importance in establishing the Nendoroid brand cannot be understated. Riding in on her lion or just swinging her sword around, the almost flat feeling of the figure makes her a perfect representative of the Nendoroid series. Her package also includes an extra face, and she can be positioned either standing or sitting for an extra fun time.
name: Nendoroid Lazy Saber (せいばー ねんどろいど)

subtitle: A mobile threat! Styled exactly like the original!! The 2nd in the 35MAX series!
description: From the new OVA "The Last Red Shoulder" that described the battle between Pailsen, Chirico and the other ex-red shoulders, comes the AT "Bloodsucker" that Chirico's rival Ypsilon rides. A jet black machine with red shoulders was sculpted straight from the design image. If you put this figure together with the "Scopedog Turbo Custom" that went on sale at the same time, you can recreate the scenes from the anime! Comes equipped with the Bloodsucker's customized machine gun, the "Braddy Rifle".
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 04 Bloodsucker (ぶらっどさっかー)

subtitle: 99 is an adult's charm, and its here to captivate you in a seductive position!
description: From the intense action comedy series "Gun X Sword", which aired in mid 2005, comes the mysterious girl with a 99cm bust, Carmen 99! The sculptor was Pla Guild's "See". Carmen's charm comes from her seductive position with her hand on her hips. Her bodyline is also an important point, but all in all, she's beautifully presented! Her sexy clothing and hip area are sculpted beautifully, and should be a part of any collection!
name: Carmen99 (かるめん)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: With completely replaceable parts and moveable joints, you can recreate multiple scenes from the original!
description: The anime version of "When They Cry", has recently starts. Using the four main heroines from the series, comes five trading action figures - Rena in her original clothes, Rena in her school uniform, Mion, Satoko and Rika. They all have replaceable face parts as well as moveable joints, you can recreate all sorts of scenes! Because the sizes of the figures are the same, you can exchange the heads, upper bodies, and lower bodies between the figures! Truly a set of figures for anyone who wants some fun!
name: COLLECT700 When They Cry (ひぐらしのなくころに)
series: When They Cry (Higurashi no Naku Koro ni)

subtitle: The spoiled princess with the pumpkin skirt is back!
description: This lovely figure of Melissa Seraphy, the popular character from Unison Soft's game Wagamama Capricio, was first put on sale in July 2006, and she's now being reissued by popular demand! Melissa herself is quite slender and sleek, with a small bust line, thrown into sharp contrast by her voluminous pumpkin skirt, a unique feature that makes Melissa truly desirable. With a Nendoroid figure on the way, there's no better time to get your very own pumpkin-skirted beauty.
name: Melissa Seraphy (めりっさ・せらふぃ)

subtitle: Another gust of wind blew through the blue skies of Hatsune island.
description: Following the release of the "Aishia" figure from the popular anime series "D.C.S.S (Da Capo Second Season)" comes the school's idol, Kotori Shirakawa! Hatsune island's wind is blowing, and Kotori can be seen posed with her hair and blue ribbon blowing in the wind, while trying to keep her white hat on her head. If you put both the Aishia and Kotori figures together you might be able to feel the wind from Hatsune island as well!
name: Kotori Shirakawa (ことり)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Shinji Koshinuma - Atsushi Yagi
copyright: © CIRCUS/ダ・カーポSS製作委員会

subtitle: Hey there everyone! It's the strong-willed, ponytailed icon Eri Sawachika!
description: Here by popular demand is the lovely Ms. Sawachika, the immensely popular blonde with a wealthy family and plenty of attitude! Her slender body in mid-stretch, hair and skirt blowing in the wind, and legs slightly spread, the beautiful Eri is sculpted in an eye-catching standing pose. Be sure to look out for the rest of the School Rumble girls, set to be released soon!
name: Eri Sawachika (さわちか えり)
copyright: © 小林尽/講談社・マーベラスエンターテイメント・創通エージェンシー

subtitle: As part of the BFC-MAX series, Guyver I has been re-released better than ever!
description: The popular action figure BFC-MAX5 "Kaiba I" has been re-released with a new head part, and new right arm parts! Using the new parts, you can recreate the "Torn off armor" scene from the front cover of the 5th volume! The original parts are also included, so both those who bought the previous figure and new customers can enjoy the figure!
name: Guyver I/Image Head Plus (がいばーわん)

subtitle: The first figure in the "Gun X Sword" figure series, Wendy, has arrived!
description: From the popular anime series "Gun X Sword" comes the flat-chested heroine Wendy, sculpted by BUBBA! The figure is excellently sculpted, depicting a scene where Wendy has put down her heavy bag to take a quick breather; you can almost hear her exhausted breathing. Max Factory is planning on releasing many more character figures from "Gun X Sword", so look forward to them!
name: Wendy (うぇんでぃ)
copyright: © 2005 AIC・チームダンチェスター/ガンソードパートナーズ

subtitle: A new member of the Nendoroids!
description: From Fate/stay night comes a Nendoroid of Lazy Saber in a special Limited Ver.!
name: Nendoroid Lazy Saber: Limited Ver. (ねんどろいど へたれ せいばーげんていVer.)

subtitle: The launch of the 35MAX Series! A mobile threat! Styled exactly like the original!
description: It's been 20 years since the original airing of "Armored Trooper VOTOMS" but it’s still as popular as ever! A new series of figures from VOTOMS has been announced, known as the 35MAX series! The first in the series is the main character Chirico's favorite machine, the "Scopedog"! The figure was sculpted using Kunio Okawara's design, which still looks amazing even after all these years. We're on a completely different scale to the others; Max Factory will leave you satisfied! Look forward to it!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 01 Scopedog (すこーぷどっく)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Takeshi Hamasaki - Atsushi Yagi

subtitle: The launch of the 35MAX Series! A mobile threat! Styled exactly like the original!
description: The new VOTOMS action figure series, 35MAX! Now that the Scopegod has been released, the "Standing Tortoise" is not far behind!! This machine appeared in the anime often... but it never had any good figures made of it. Finally Max Factory has sculpted a figure with the best proportions, and of course the handy rocket gun is also included. It can also hold the Scopedog's heavy machinegun! Look forward to the rest of the figures coming up in this series!
name: 35MAX AT-COLLECTION SERIES 02: Standing Tortoise. (すたんでぃんぐとーたす)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Takeshi Hamasaki - Atsushi Yagi

subtitle: If you say she's flat-chested, you're doomed.
description: Announcing Etna, the main character from the simulation RPG "Disgaea: Hour of Darkness", identical to the resin kit that was released in 2003 by BUBBA, this figure will be available just before the anime version of the series starts airing. Summon the cute little demon into your room!
name: Etna (えとな)
copyright: © 2003 NIPPON ICHI SOFTWARE INC./暗黒議会

subtitle: The second in the 1/10th scale Mai-Hime project!
description: Continuing from the first piece in the 1/10th GSC Mai-Hime project, the lovely Natsuki Kuga, master sculptor Sakurasaka Mikoto brings us the gorgeous Mai Tokiha! This is a novel take on Mai from Ms. Sakurasaka's mind, slightly different from the usual design. Taken as a set with her Natsuki Kuga, the Sakarasaka Mai-Hime world is sure to grow on any discerning collector.
name: Mai Tokiha (ときはまい)

description: Sculpted with soft, clear plastic in a open shirt, down to the last detail!

A while ago, a legendary polystone figure of Mizuho Kazami from "Please! Teacher" was put one sale. Now that same figure is available, as a PVC figure! The figure was sculpted by Chieri, who truly is in a league of her own. The PVC version features slight changes to the breasts, new removable extras, and also a carpet stand that gives the figure a gorgeous feeling. And don’t forget the open shirt that Mizuho is wearing, it really shows off her pride.... It's a perfect figure! This is something you really need to see for yourself!
name: Mizuho Kazami (かざみみずほ)

subtitle: Here we have Genshiken's Kanako Ohno changing into a cosplay outfit!
description: Kanako Ohno is a cosplay maniac, shown here in the second GSC Genshiken figure in the middle of changing into her newest outfit. Her bold and sexy pose is in sharp contrast to her usual shy and demure personality in this rare, mouth-watering gem. In addition, her skirt can be replaced with a set of sheer pantyhose, for triple the fun!
name: Kanako Ohno (おおのかなこ)
copyright: © 2004 木尾士目・講談社 / 現視研研究会

subtitle: Sculpted using a scene from the 10th episode in the anime series "Don't Get Me Wet!!" All the heroines are in a bathing scene, don't miss it!
description: Following the "Onegai Taraku Collection", this is the second set of cute girl trading figures from Max Factory! From the comedy set in a Japanese temple, “Amaenaideyo!!" comes 6 of the girls in a bathing scene, as trading figures! Behind the stream, is everything the girls are trying to hide!
name: Collect500 Amaenaideyo (あまえないでよっ!!)
sculptor: Yuuji Kudou - Masanori Kuroda - Masato Kitade - Tetsuya Yamada
copyright: © 2005ボヘミアンK・宗我部としのり/ワニブックス・AT-X・VAP

subtitle: "No underwear?!"  Akiba Blog's popular character is here!
description: Akiba Blog, the popular site dealing with Akihabara culture, finally has a figure of its adorable mascot, Nerd-tan! Looking like she sprang directly from the million-selling English trainer, Moetan, Nerd-tan is simply irresistible. What's she got under her skirt? find out for yourself!
<Akiba Special Product Announcement!> Customers who purchase this figure from the following stores will receive a special pair of limited edition panties for her courtesy of Akiba Blog!
name: Nerd-tan (なーど)

subtitle: Is there some magic that can make everybody happy?
description: From the popular anime "D.C.S.S (Da Capo Second Season)" comes a figure of Aishia! She's an incredibly kind girl, who is always hoping that everyone else will be happy. She's captured in a heartwarming, gentle spring scene of collecting sakura petals in her skirt. Feel free to decorate your desk with her beauty! Kotori Shirakawa from the same series will also be on sale soon!
name: Aishia (あいしあ)
copyright: © CIRCUS/ダ・カーポSS製作委員会

description: Nao
name: Nao (なお)
copyright: Developed by devCat Copyright (c) NEXON Corporation and NEXON Japan Co., Ltd. All rights reserved

subtitle: The first Nendoroid, Neko Arc, has finally returned!
description: Here we have the very first Nendoroid, the origin of the super-deformed sensation that's been sweeping the globe, back by popular demand for general sale!

This ground breaking figure, sculpted in a refreshingly soft style, includes multiple interchangeable parts and accessories, notably the widely requested and very mysterious jet mode to fly straight into your heart. Target confirmed! No one can be called a true Nendoroid fan without this in hand.
name: Nendoroid Neko Arc : Convert! Mysterious Jet Flight Edition (ねこあるく ねんどろいど 「かんそう！などのじぇっとひこう」へん)

description: Magical girl Rin
name: Magical girl Rin (まほうしょうじょ りん)

subtitle: The first figure in the CAPCOM GIRL-FIGHTING series, Cammy!
description: From the popular designer "Kita Nishimura"! From the "GIRL-FIGHTING" representative illustration, comes a figure of Cammy! Sculptor "Chieri", being a fan of Nishimura, has faithfully reproduced the illustration as a figure! It's sculpting far beyond any normal figure. Enjoy Cammy's beautiful body! Other than Cammy, there are another two figures in the Kita Nishimura GIRL-FIGHTING series: Sakura, and Chun-Li are also planned for release.
name: Cammy (きゃみー)

subtitle: Equipped with the miraculous moment mechanism, the "super-movable joint"!
description: From the show with a cult-like following, "Godannar" which aired on TOKYO MX.TV, comes the Godannar itself as a brand new MAX Alloy figure. The Twin Drive Mode has been copied directly into a figure. It's so poseable, that it'll leave you thinking that it's not really made with alloy, it completely destroys any thoughts you had of alloy before - the super joints can even reproduce the various hand to hand battles showed in the anime. This is an example of a perfect alloy figure.
name: MAX Alloy: Godannar Twin Drive Mode (ごーだんなー)

subtitle: The second figure in the CAPCOM GIRL-FIGHTING series, Sakura!
description: From the popular designer "Kita Nishimura"! From the "GIRL-FIGHTING" representative illustration, comes a figure of Sakura! Based on the original illustrations of Kita Nishimura, the bright and cheerful Sakura has been sculpted by the super sculpting master "Chieri"! She's been displayed giving off a truly uplifting feeling; it's as if it simply jumped off the illustration itself. Other than Sakura, there are another two figures in the Kita Nishimura GIRL-FIGHTING series: Cammy, and Chun-Li, who is planned to be released.
name: Sakura (さくら)

description: Avp Alien Qeen
name: Avp Alien Qeen (えいりあんくぃーん ゆるそふび)
series: エイリアンvsプレデター

subtitle: The third figure in the CAPCOM GIRL-FIGHTING series, Chun-Li!
description: Planned to be released in one month, following the releases of the two previous figures in the series "Cammy" and "Sakura" comes the popular "Chun-Li"! The powerful illustration of her has been recreated as figure, from her strong body to the pose in her finishing move the "Lightning Kick", it feels like she could come to life at any second! Be sure to collect all three gorgeous figures in the "Kita Nishimura Collection"!
name: Chun-Li (ちゅんりー)

subtitle: "I see. Very well then Kuro Daijuuji.  I will make a contract with you..."
description: It's been a PC game, manga, novel, PS2 game as well as an upcoming anime; "Demonbane" has been on all sorts of media. From the first of the games, "Zanmataisei Demonbane", comes a figurine of the main heroine "Al Azif". With an innocent, cute look, the figure shows the complete opposite of her true pompous, arrogant personality. Prototype sculptor Katou Taichi sculpted her as if she was suspiciously leaning against a wall in a dark alley. Also take note of her hair and ribbons gently blowing in the wind.
name: Al Azif (あるあじふ)
sculptor: Max Factory Motion Study Department - Takeshi Hamasaki - Atsushi Yagi

subtitle: Mai swoops down as another PVC figure.
description: Fuka Academy's 1st year in class 3, Mai Tokiha. She has a strong-willed, obstinate personality, but she's a very cheerful girl, she also acts as a mother for her younger brother. Using that image, master sculptor Chieri has sculpted a large 1/6 scale figure of her. Now you can also be soothed by her wonderful breasts.
name: Mai Tokiha (ときはまい)

description: AVP Celtic Predator
name: AVP Celtic Predator (けるてぃっくぷれでたー ゆるそふび)
series: エイリアンvsプレデター

subtitle: Nendoroid Neko Arc : Convert! Grumbling Face Edition!
description: From Neko Arc comes a new edition of Nendoroid Neko Arc - this time with a grumbling expression!
name: Nendoroid Neko Arc : Convert! Grumbling Face Edition (ねんどろいど ねこあるく 「かんそう！ぶーぶーがお」へん)

subtitle: Guyver I's Giant Bioboosted Armor "Guyver Gigantic" is finally here!
description: Sho Fukumachi, the user of the Guyver I armor, made a silent prayer: "I want power to protect my friends from this enemy...!", and thus he received new power - the Guyver Gigantic. Just like the Gigantic Dark, there are parts to recreate the Giga Smasher, the High Frequency Swords, and the Gravity Ram - you can recreate virtually all the techniques in the story with the included parts. All the parts to recreate scenes are included. You can also recreate the flying form of the Guyver Gigantic. It's truly a masterpiece of poseable action figures
name: Guyver Gigantic (がいばーぎがんてっく)
